data.name: Vertical Kingdom
data.detailed_description:
Vertical Kingdom is a roguelite that mixes cities and cards. Due to the fact that there is not much space, you have to build vertically, with the help of platforms and other constructions. You will go on expeditions to obtain resources that will help you improve your camp for your next trips.



To build your city you will use each turn a series of cards that will appear, and you will have to manage the resources generated by certain buildings in order to build other buildings. Your main objective is to get as many inhabitants as possible to live in each city, without their loyalty reaching zero. Once you reach a certain number of citizens, you can travel to the next place.



In each new place, you will notice that space is limited, so be careful and choose wisely where to place each building, each building will have its special bonuses when placed near other buildings.



As you progress through the main story, new cards will be unlocked for your city, which will help you build vertically and have more and more citizens in your city.



In addition to the campaign mode, there will be an endless mode and a sandbox mode so you can build the city you want without limitations.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 3.40 Ghz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTx 1080
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
